#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t,a,b,sum;
    cin>>t;
    while(t>0)
    { sum=0;
        cin>>a>>b;
        int c[a];
        for(int i=0;i<a;i++)
        {
            cin>>c[i];
            
        }
        sort(c,c+a);
        
        for(int j=0;j<a-b;j++)
        sum+=c[j];
        cout<<sum<<"\n";
        t--;
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
